data.name: Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory
data.detailed_description:
Save Falafel from within a towering, puzzling laboratory!

Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory is a puzzle game that has been described as “a combination between Pac-Man and chess”. Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her dog, Falafel, from the confines of a mysterious towering laboratory deep within a solitary forest. Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory combines puzzle and strategy elements with an engaging storyline full of memorable characters and biting humor.
data.about_the_game:
Save Falafel from within a towering, puzzling laboratory!

Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory is a puzzle game that has been described as “a combination between Pac-Man and chess”. Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her dog, Falafel, from the confines of a mysterious towering laboratory deep within a solitary forest. Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory combines puzzle and strategy elements with an engaging storyline full of memorable characters and biting humor.
data.short_description: Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her doggy sidekick Falafel from the vertiginous confines of Dr. Kobushi's laboratory. Over a hundred pixelated puzzles will have you avoiding killer robots as you engage with memorable characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
